member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Inspector.Editor.InspectorProperty
member.summary:
Represents a property in the Unity inspector, providing access to property information, value management, drawing capabilities, and hierarchical property structure.
This class manages the lifecycle of inspector properties including initialization, value updates, drawing, and disposal. It supports property resolvers, attribute resolution, drawer chains, and grouping for complex inspector layouts.

member.summary: Gets the property tree that this property belongs to, which manages the entire inspector property hierarchy.

member.summary: Gets the collection of child properties for this property, or null if this property has no children.

member.summary: Gets the metadata information about this property, including type information, member accessors, and resolver configuration.
